game.shortDescription: Pleas,desires,cravings...The human heart knows no bounds,and the reasons are legion. To judge or to bless?The choice is yours to wield! In this ARPG,you hold the power to shape destinies,but only with the courage to conquer formidable foes. At the edge of memory,the truth of this world awaits...
